article.title: Tickle Appointed to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense (Acquisition

article.text: Ronald E. Tickle has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the Executive Director, DoD Siting Clearinghouse, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
